talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$White Dragon Iona$
Umm~ {user_nick}, did you say you're going to meet this person called… Cidel?

$White Dragon Iona$
I will stay here so come back when you're done!
I will talk to the other adventurers too~!
(Iona waves his hand. Meet Cidel at Riverwort Wharf.)

$Cidel Fairystar$
{user_nick}! What's the matter? Why are you in such a hurry.…?

${user_nick}$
Quick! Do you have a minute? I have something important to tell you.

$Cidel Fairystar$
I have a meeting righ… Nevermind!(Cidel closes the cover of the documents he was holding)
Tell me what it's about.

${user_nick}$
Anu Arendel is in deep shit now! The Red Dragon and his minions, the Dragon Followers, are trying to destroy the Monolith.

$Cidel Fairystar$
(His eyes open wide)The Monolith!? Does it really exist…?

${user_nick}$
Yes. It's a world that is different from ours, and acts like a medium that connects us to the Goddess. And the Red Dragon is trying to do something to it. We need to stop him!

$Cidel Fairystar$
Wait… So this is all real? Okay, I will get the Fairystar Sorceresses and Sorcerers to investigate about the Monolith.

${user_nick}$
Investigate only? Aren't you going to send some over for reinforcement?

$Cidel Fairystar$
Hmm… It hasn't been long since Master Karacule passed away and we can't act independently… Oh! Maybe you can get some help from the Court Sorceresses by talking to Lady Kayleen.

${user_nick}$
Ah, that would work too.

$Cidel Fairystar$
We are just about to have our regular meeting now too, so we will investigate and send information to Kayleen. I hope you can go to her and tell her about the situation. We will try our best to send the information as soon as we can.

$Cidel Fairystar$
Haha, I never thought I would get praised by you. I can't remain as a child forever. I want to live up to the expectation of being the leader of Fairystar. Like Karacule.

${user_nick}$
…Karacule must be happy if she sees how well you've grown. I'll see you later then.

$Cidel Fairystar$
Okay! See you!
(Go to Saint Haven and meet Royal Sorceress Kayleen)

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
Why are you here only now!

${user_nick}$
What!?

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
Cidel has already sent over an express mail. Thanks to that, two of my Force Users who kept the Teleport open are too tired to do anything now. Monolith? Hah! Outrageous… Such thing really existed? And a "Red Dragon" is trying to destroy that?

${user_nick}$
Yeah….

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
I'm speechless! I thought ordinary people couldn't enter the Monolith, but the Red Dragon is trying to enter that? And why is a dragon dealing with all the Dragon Followers?

${user_nick}$
Oh, he must have been a human originally. Someone by the name of Feder…

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
What? Feder? That's the same name as the king who founded this kingdom. Oh my… we can't go straight into the Monolith, and to deploy the Court Sorceresses… I can't really do as I please since that old man is back... Ah, he's back at such a great timing.

${user_nick}$
Are you talking about Pope Terramai? That's a little unexpected.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wrinkles? There is not even a small wrinkle on your face, Lady Kayleen.</html>
<html>What? Your beauty is as stunning as before.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
I'm just trying to show my respect since he once was Karacule's comrade. Phew, I can feel the wrinkles increasing on my face.

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
(Kayleen laughs like she is pleased)Hahaha! You have an eye for beauty. I will make my voice heard at the meeting later. Go and tell Cidel that I will deploy the Court Sorceresses using whatever means. Though we can't do anything with the Monolith, we can sweep the Dragon Followers near that away.

${user_nick}$
Okay! Thank you!

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
Wait a second, come here before you leave.

${user_nick}$
…?
(Kayleen quietly chants a spell when you approach her. Bright light shines around my face and disappears)

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
This is my special spell, [Goddess's Skincare]. Hahaha it's a special gift for you. You should take care of your complexion even when you are in battles. Now go to Cidel and tell him that he has Lady Kayleen's full support.

${user_nick}$
Thank you! (My skin has really firmed up and the tone is brighter. I should go to Cidel and convey Kayleen's message)

$Cidel Fairystar$
{user_nick}! How did it go? I hope I wasn't too late. I've emphasized the importance of the documents several times to the newbie Force Users…

${user_nick}$
Not at all. They are too exhausted now after using too much energy to transport the files.

$Cidel Fairystar$
What, really? Did I push them too much…

${user_nick}$
No, thanks to you everything went well. Kayleen is going to deploy the Court Sorceresses. She said it would be hard to enter the Monolith, but trust the Sorceresses on dealing with the Dragon Followers around the Monolith.

$Cidel Fairystar$
That's great. If enough people have gathered on our side, I will let you know too.
Er… {user_nick}… Is that… [Goddess's Skincare]?!

${user_nick}$
Wow how did you know?

$Cidel Fairystar$
Well, I'm always surrounded by Sorceresses… how can I not know.
(Cidel touches his cheeks like he is worried. Why…?)

${user_nick}$
You should try making relaxing spells and all that too.
Then I will make a move first. I will be at Anu Arendel.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Don't I look reserved enough?
But I think I am really really old in terms of age.
(Iona is mumbling to himself with a serious face)

${user_nick}$
Being reserved doesn't go well with you.
You look too young for that.

$White Dragon Iona$
Ah, {user_nick}… H-how did it go? {user_nick}Did they agree?
I was quite successful! Other adventurers are going to help out too.
(Iona stands proudly)

${user_nick}$
Hey, don't you know that I have valuable contacts, from the leader of the Fairystar to the Court Sorceress! The smartest Sorceresses are on their job to investigate more about the Monolith so they will be of great help.

$White Dragon Iona$
Wow, {user_nick}!
I've been thinking all along that you are somehow very reliable.

$White Dragon Iona$
Erm, {user_nick}... I actually have something to ask you.
I have something in my mind…Won't you come and find me at
Forest of Waiting Noon? I want to talk to you alone.

$Cidel Fairystar$
Okay! I will inform you soon.
(Cidel waves his had. Go to Anu Arendel and tell Iona that everything went well)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

${user_nick}$
Erm… Okay.

(Talk to White Dragon Iona at Forest of Waiting Noon)

$White Dragon Iona$
….Oh you're here, {user_nick}!
Ehem, I will go straight to the point.
Actually I came across an adventurer who is kind of like my little sister.
(Iona smiles happily)

${user_nick}$
An adventurer who's like your little sister?
Actually by right, everyone in this world is younger than you in terms of age.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Why care if you will look reserved when what you will be doing is to play??)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…No. (Iona shakes his head) Not something like that.
Hehehe. She's a little scary but I feel like she can be my little sister… or maybe niece. I want to play with her like a reserved old brother.

$White Dragon Iona$
…So I was going to ask you, {user_nick}- I thought you might know well!
How do I play with a younger sister? I was always alone so I don't really know.
Oh, since we're going to meet at Hafling, maybe we can play with snow!

${user_nick}$
That's kind of sad. You need to learn how to play…
If you were at Hafling, haven't you already mastered how to play with snow?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I think something went into my eyes...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…Erm like making snow mountain, or eating snow?
Snow is cold so I can't really eat much…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course. I will teach you Sparta Goblin style.</html>
<html>Great. I have mastered the art of playing in Mana Ridge!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
So are you going to teach me?

${user_nick}$
…(I've given him a crash course on how to play with snow, including how to build a snowman and snowfights, etc. I don't know if he understood correctly but he sure showed great attention.)

$White Dragon Iona$
…Wow the world of playing is endless!
Hehe I picked the right person to ask.
{user_nick}, you teach very well.

${user_nick}$
You can have more fun with equipment.
But why are you meeting her in Hafling? How about the Monolith?

$White Dragon Iona$
Erm well...
I thought telling you this might make you angry too.
(Iona looks at the floor)

${user_nick}$
I woudn't be angry unless you're going to make my efforts become wasted and run away…
I'll hear you out first.

$White Dragon Iona${action:Horrified}
I'm not running away!
I mean, I’m going away but it's not like that.
I wouldn't do that. Actually, I don't want to say goodbye also….

${user_nick}$
…Something must have happened, am I right?

$White Dragon Iona$
Yeah… Well.
(Iona doesn't dare to look into your eyes)

${user_nick}$
…I'll try not to be angry. What's wrong?

$White Dragon Iona$
…You know, After you left, I met many good adventurers.
They all understood the danger the Monolith is facing, and agreed to help.
But none of them would remain sane after entering the Monolith.

$White Dragon Iona$
…And I can only protect one person inside the Monolith.
It's cruel to let only one of them do the fighting when all the rest of them are willing to help.
That would be failing to recognize their passion to protect this world.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If you give away the power that holds your form, doesn't that mean you're going to disappear?</html>
<html>That's enough to make other adventurers angry!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…But there's one way that all the adventurers can enter the Monolith.
I… I am made up of memories held together in a body by the power of my jewel. If I share all the power I have with the adventurers, they can go to the Monolith without losing their mind.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Everyone's so caring, hehe. I'm glad and sad at the same time.
Actually I exist to protect this world. You don't have to worry about me that much.
Thinking about the evil I've spread in this world, I can also understand it if you guys hate me...

${user_nick}$
The evil you've spread in this world? Are you talking about Beyond Dragon's poison?
That's not something you wanted.
Though the results were devastating….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Men who hold on to the past are unattractive!</html>
<html>…No matter how much you think about the gamble, your money can't come back.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
… Yeah... I hate it too. I hate myself for making such a choice in the past.
If it wasn't for me, everything would have been fine. I just can't stand it when I think about it…
(Iona turns away. His eyes look full of tears)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're looking down on humans too much.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…Hey what are you doing!
I'm seriosu… Honestly, don't you blame me?
If it wasn't for me, all the humans could be living happily.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Eh but… humans are different from Ancients!
But I still think that humans will hate me.
That is what always scared me… Humans judge based on the wrongs a person has done.

${user_nick}$
That's true but you have no choice.
And that's why you're trying so hard to resolve the problem now.
I'm a little angry that you came out of Hafling only now, but you can pay that back later.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Really?
…If I really work hard and solve everything, would they forgive me?
…To resolve everything… it might take a long time. But I will do whatever I can to achieve it.

${user_nick}$
Yeah that's the spirit.
Look at me. I was once called the Princess of Gambling, but I carry on with my life.
I don't know how a dragon's life ought to be, but keep in mind that there are people like me too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Quickly grab Iona's shoulders) Let's forget about the past, shall we?</html>
<html>(With a loud voice) Hahaha! Yeah I was a little young and naive!!!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…(Iona seems to remember the name) …Huh? Princess of Gambling?
I think the wanted posters were put up all the way at Hafling as well.
I'm sure it was the person the Orcs wanted to catch…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Curiosity of little kids is annoying) Hey hey!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona${action:Smile}
…Hahaha {user_nick}, you're a fun person.
But what really happened…?
(Iona stares with eyes full of curiosity)

${user_nick}$
Oh yes, Iona! This is not the time for that story.
What did you mean by disappearing?

$White Dragon Iona$
…Just… as it is.

${user_nick}$
…It's too extreme. How are you going to atone for your deeds if you disappaer?
That is not a good way. Why don't we minimize the number of adventurers?
Or think of another way to get the power?

$White Dragon Iona$
…No, I need to save everyone.
And I've thought about other ways... But there isn't any.
We can't use the power of other Chaos Dragons who were corrupted, and we can't trouble the Ancient Dragons who are busy protecting the Monolith.

${user_nick}$
…But still… I'm not going to get your power. NEVER.

$White Dragon Iona$
…But it's not that we'll part forever. You can see me again at Hafling!
When all the adventurers who got my power come to Hafling where my jewel is, the power and jewel will react and I will be resurrected again.

${user_nick}$
…Eh really? Then you should have said so earlier!
But it still means goodbye. …Ah I never thought this would happen. You're a bad boy. If you do this, none of the adventurers will dare to die. They will do whatever they can to keep alive and go to Hafling.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Hehe I hope so too.
And I was worried that you might be too sad… but it's a relief.

${user_nick}$
I would be lying if I said I wasn't sad. It's a farewell afterall even if we can meet again.
We must meet again. Wait for me at Hafling, okay?
I will go and find you after killing the Red Dragon. Let's all meet and play together.

$White Dragon Iona$
Yes of course! I will wait for you.
Goodbye for now, {user_nick}…. Thank you.

${user_nick}$
……(He disappeared… This is real… There's nothing left. Dragons really disappear without leaving anything behind. And Iona doesn't even have a jewel with him so there really isn't anything.)

${user_nick}$
……(And the conditions for meeting him again is a little tough. First, all the adventurers who got Iona's power must stay alive. No, maybe before that, we must succeed in killing the Red Dragon. Anyway, the dragons are so messed up! Some are too weak and some are too strong...)

${user_nick}$
……(…He makes me worried… The Goddess should have made a strong dragon. Why did she create a little kid? Or is it because he was born not long ago? Would he become better if he grows and becomes like Geraint?)

${user_nick}$
……(Hmm, I wonder how the meeting at the Royal Castle went. Maybe I should go to Elf Elder and talk to him first)

(Meet Elf Elder)

$Elf Elder$
Welcome back, {user_nick}. I've heard the news from a messenger from Saint Haven.
Several adventurersSeveral adventurers including you seem to have warned the King about the danger the Monolith is facing.
…There is no more place to hide. The time has come for your powers to be used, {user_nick}.
Please save your strength until then.

${user_nick}$
…Several adventurers? Oh that's why it didn't take long to convince them…
I see, then please call me later.
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Elf Elder$
(…Maybe Iona's sincerity was felt. I hope he waits for you quietly at Hafling. You can have all the time in the world together and tell him about the battle at the Monolith after everything is over.)

(You have completed Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend)

journal.title: For Hope 1
journal.contents:
You have decided to inform Cidel at Lotus Marsh.
Go and talk to Cidel.

Riverwort Wharf (Karacule's Hut) - Cidel Fairystar
journal.destination: Talk to Cidel at Karacule's Hut

journal.title: For Hope 2
journal.contents:
Smart Cidel was able to grasp what is happening quickly.
Go and tell Royal Sorceress Kayleen about the situation.

Saint Haven - Saint Haven Royal Castle (Royal Sorceress Kayleen)

journal.title: For Hope 3
journal.contents:
You have finished convincing Kayleen.
Tell Cidel about the situation.

Riverwort Wharf (Karacule's Hut) - Cidel Fairystar
journal.destination: Talk to Cidel at Karacule's Hut
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Cidel at Riverwort Wharf.

journal.title: For Hope 4
journal.contents:
Everything went well.
Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance and inform him.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - White Dragon Iona

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Iona at Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance.

journal.title: For Hope 5
journal.contents:
Iona said he has something to tell you and asked you to come to the Forest of Waiting Noon alone.
Go to Forest of Waiting Noon.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon(White Dragon Iona)

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk at the Forest of Waiting Noon
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at Forest of Waiting Noon.

journal.title: For Hope 6
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared…
You have promised to meet him at Hafling but…
Think for a while on what to do next.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon (Where Iona disappeared)
journal.todo_msg: Compose your thoughts for a while where Iona disappeared.

journal.title: For Hope 7
journal.contents:
You have decided what to do next.
Meet Elf Elder at the Tree of Life Entrance.
Talk to Elf Elder.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Elder
journal.destination: Go to Elf Elder after making the decision

journal.title: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] Completed
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared after leaving all his powers with you.
What is left to do now is to fight Red Dragon Feder at the Monolith.
Come back with victory.

* [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
journal.todo_msg: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
